subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares had two key assists as the Islanders defeated Anaheim, the N.H.L.’s lowest-scoring team, 5-2, at Barclays Center.
snippet: John Tavares had two key assists as the Islanders defeated Anaheim, the N.H.L.’s lowest-scoring team, 5-2, at Barclays Center.
